div.p: Freies Deutsches Hochstift Frankfurter Goethemuseum, Frankfurt am Main.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. MS annotation: '581/557 Abschrift versandt 15/VII. 1880' [copy sent 15 July 1880].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Dr med. et phil Ferd. Baron von Müller Mr.F.D.H.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: d. Z. Stiftsrath des Freien Deutschen Hochstiftes

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter Bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Zuschrift und Sendung vom 29/XI. 1879 mit welchen Sie die Güte hatten, uns Ihre Eucalyptographia Fourth Decade freundlichst mitzutheilen danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Dr med. and phil. Ferd. Baron von Mueller Mr. F. D. H.
Meister des Freien Deutschen Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy]. State plant researcher at present councillor of the Freies Deutsche Hochstift

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Frankfurt on Main, 29 Snow-month
i.e. January.
1880

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of 29 November 1879 with which you had the goodness to kindly convey to us your Eucalyptographia Fourth Decade
B79.13.11. we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
